field.name: summary
field.value: WindsorDynamicActionProviderFactory and Friends - Get WindsorIntegration on DynamicActionProviders now

field.name: description
field.value:
This patch enables IDynamicActionProvider implementations to be included in WIndsorIntegration wiring for Controller consumption. Basically, I followed the same semantics as IFilter throughout (with all the various factories for descriptors, providers, and so on). I updated tests to include the new service as well.
All tests are passing after this update. I think this opens a whole new way of working for me....

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
